description: Resource Owner mappings for production Okta tenant
notes: This file is the source of truth for resource owner assignments
To add a new owner assignment, submit a PR adding the owner to the appropriate resource
Run 'gh workflow run apply-owners.yml -f environment=production -f dry_run=false' to apply changes to Okta
Run 'python3 scripts/sync_owner_mappings.py --output environments/production/config/owner_mappings.json' to sync from Okta
